pages.text: Ensouled randomly adds one of a list of bonuses when casting Soul type spells.$(br2)Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:armor/ensouled_gear)Ensouled Gear$()$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/talisman_of_lost_memories)Talisman of Lost Memories$()

pages.mod_text: The armor emanates a disturbing aura, almost like someone inside is trying to cry out. Your bond to spells of the soul is strengthened.
